titles.title: Small Family Farmer And Rancher Relief Act
Small Family Farmer And Rancher Relief Act
To provide assistance to certain small family farmers and ranchers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary:
Small Family Farmer And Rancher Relief Act
This bill increases premium and insurance subsidies for certain small family farmers and ranchers, creates a program to provide relief to small producers when cattle prices and values exceed a specified threshold level, and establishes a grant program to assist cattle producers to market and add value to beef products.
